motivations.quote: Indeed, with hardship comes ease.
The most beloved deed to Allah is the most regular and constant even if it were little.
And whoever puts all his trust in Allah, He will be enough for him.
Say, 'My Lord, forgive and have mercy, and You are the best of the merciful.'
Indeed, Allah loves those who rely upon Him.
Do not lose hope, nor be sad.
The best among you are those who have the best manners and character.
Verily, after hardship, there is ease.
Allah does not burden a soul beyond that it can bear.
And your Lord is going to give you, and you will be satisfied.
Indeed, Allah is with those who fear Him and those who are doers of good.
Allah's mercy encompasses all things.
The best among people are those that bring most benefit to mankind.
The heart that is grateful will never be poor.
Patience is the key to relief.
Seek knowledge from the cradle to the grave.
The strongest among you is the one who controls his anger.
The best of people are those that bring the most benefit to others.
Repent to Allah, for indeed Allah loves those who repent.
Do good and do not seek recognition.
Make things easy and do not make them difficult.
Remember Allah, and He will remember you.
The best form of worship is to seek Allah’s pleasure.
Trust in Allah but tie your camel.
The most beloved words to Allah are: SubhanAllah, Alhamdulillah, La ilaha illa Allah, Allahu Akbar.
Keep your tongue moist with the remembrance of Allah.
Sincerity is the foundation of worship.
Do not despair of Allah’s mercy.
The believer’s shade on the Day of Resurrection will be their charity.
The best deed is the prayer at its proper time.
Indeed, Allah loves those who rely on Him.
Even a smile is charity.
The cure for ignorance is to ask and learn.
Be kind to your parents and be humble.
The best among you are those who learn the Qur'an and teach it.
Turn to Allah in repentance, for He is the Most Merciful.
Every day is a new opportunity for forgiveness and mercy.
Make your dua your weapon and your patience your armor.
Patience and prayer are the two keys to success.
The best wealth is contentment.
Seek Allah's forgiveness daily.
Allah’s plan is always better than ours.
Keep your heart attached to the Hereafter.
He who puts his trust in Allah will never be lost.
Allah's guidance is the greatest blessing.
Good character is the best inheritance.
Strive for Allah’s pleasure in all your actions.
